Key Match Events: Miami won 104-100 after a late 19-5 run
Houston led by as many as 12 points midway through the third quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seven ejections took place during the final minute of the game
Others: Amen Thompson threw Herro to the ground after they exchanged words
Fred VanVleet was thrown out for making contact with referee Marc Davis following a 5-second call being assessed against the Rockets
